meta.title: Smart contract blockchain with a community-managed treasury
meta.description: Edgeware is a smart contract blockchain with a community-managed treasury, decentralised proposal system and network of DAOs.

mentions.name: Ryan Zurrer
mentions.text:
Huge congrats to @hicommonwealth as @HeyEdgeware #Lockdrop just passed 1 million ETH locked &/or signalled,
absolutely crushing our most optimistic projections.
🙌 The global community rising up around this protocol is inspiring, especially the excitement out here in China.🇨🇳✌️

mentions.name: Valerie Tetu
mentions.text:
The @HeyEdgeware community is one of the most impressive examples of effective organic decentralised collaboration and coordination.
love #DAOs. (and if you join, you will too!!!)

mentions.name: Du Capital
mentions.text:
Amazing turnout at the @web3foundation @polkadotnetwork & ecosystem meetup in China’s tech hub Shenzhen.
Crowd also got excited by @HeyEdgeware and @chainx_org , both of which has a token distribution mechanism that really emphasises on the community.
Pleasure hosting you guys!

mentions.name: Parity Technologies
mentions.text:
Congratulations to @HeyEdgeware for launching!
🎉 Check out this #Substrate-based chain at https://t.co/Eo5ugKqK1K. https://t.co/lmpkUvWtpa

mentions.name: Dave Nemetz
mentions.text:
DAOs are coming for media
With full treasuries, DAOs are creating content to build their narrative
Examples:
- @FWBtweets has a full editorial team
- @HeyEdgeware is funding podcasts & other media projects
- @forefront__ just raised $2M to create more content
Others?

mentions.name: Polkadot News
mentions.text:
Last week, the @heyedgeware community voted to approve funding for a community run foundation, a DAO called @edgeware_agency,
to accelerate the growth of the community and it's path towards being an incubator for a new #Web3 media ecosystem on #Substrate.
https://edgeware.agency
